description: This creamy mushroom, bacon and thyme soup recipe is a comfort food favourite. Serve it with crunchy croutons and extra crispy bacon on top.
name: Mushroom, Bacon & Thyme Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup thickened cream (plus extra to serve)
2 tbs thyme leaves (plus extra sprigs to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until golden. Transfer bacon to a plate lined with paper towel. Reserve 1/4 cup bacon.
Add butter and remaining oil to same pan. Add onion, carrot, celery, garlic, mushroom and thyme and cook, stirring, for 10 minutes or until softened. Add flour, stirring to combine.

Add stock and sauces, stirring to combine. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until vegetables have softened, adding spinach and bacon in the last 2 minutes of cooking time. Stir in cream.
Using a stick blender, blend until smooth. Ladle soup into bowls, swirl through extra cream, and top with reserved bacon, extra thyme and croutons. Serve.
